Container.Name: binhex-official-windows
Container.DonateText: If you appreciate my work, then please consider buying me a beer :D

Config.Name: Port: Web Interface
Config.Description: This is the Web UI port for the application.

Config.Name: Port: RDP Interface TCP
Config.Description: This is the Web UI port for the application.

Config.Name: Port: RDP Interface UDP
Config.Description: This is the Web UI port for the application.

Config.Name: Path: /storage
Config.Description: This is the container path to store the VM's vdisk etc.

Config.Name: Path: /data
Config.Description: This is the container path to store shared files accessible from the VM.

Config.Name: Path: /custom.iso
Config.Description: This is the container path to a custom iso file, please note if this is specified then it will override the version of Windows specified via the variable 'VERSION'.

Config.Name: Path: /oem
Config.Description: This is the container path to a folder containing custom scripts to run post install.

Config.Name: Variable: VERSION
Config.Description: Specify the version of Windows to install (see https://github.com/dockur/windows#how-do-i-use-it for full version description), please note these are all evaluation versions of Windows downloaded from Microsoft.

Config.Name: Variable: DISK_SIZE
Config.Description: Specify the virtual disk size in GB.

Config.Name: Variable: RAM_SIZE
Config.Description: Specify the amount of RAM allocated in GB.

Config.Name: Variable: KEYBOARD
Config.Description: Specify the keyboard layout for Windows.
